items.sentence: I\'m sure Tom won\'t have any trouble finding us.
I\'m sure you\'ll enjoy studying French with Tom.
Would you be willing to help me clean the garage?
Would you like me to teach you how to play chess?
Our only alternative is to do what Tom suggested.
Please give me a pencil and some sheets of paper.
Tom isn\'t much of a cook, but at least he tries.
Those two shirts are made from the same material.
Three years ago, I was in Boston on October 20th.
Tom told me that he didn\'t like speaking French.
